nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:enchanted_book","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Enchanted Book\",\"color\":\"blue\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Thunderbolt VI\",\"color\":\"blue\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Every \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"3 \",\"color\":\"red\"},{\"text\":\"hits on a monster, strike\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"lightning\",\"color\":\"yellow\"},{\"text\":\", dealing \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"25% \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"of the hit's\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"damage to up to 10 monsters within 2\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"blocks.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Use this on an item in an Anvil\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"to apply it!\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Source:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"VI: \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"Dungeon,\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"Experiments\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Applied To:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Sword\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Fishing Weapon\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Longsword\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Gauntlet\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Conflicts:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Thunderlord\",\"color\":\"red\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"RARE\",\"color\":\"blue\",\"bold\":true}"]}}
